00007 std::vector<std::string> TMuonEvent::fDetectorNames;

00009 TMuonEvent::TMuonEvent(){
00010         // The first muon_event to be created will fill the vector of detector names
00011         if(fDetectorNames.size() ==0){
00012                 const int num_det_names=21;
00013                 const char* det_names[num_det_names]={ 
00014                         "Ge", "LiquidSc", "NDet", "NDet2", "ScGe", "ScL", "ScR",
00015                         "ScVe", "SiL1_1", "SiL1_2", "SiL1_3", "SiL1_4", "SiL2", "SiR1_1",
00016                         "SiR1_2", "SiR1_3", "SiR1_4", "SiR1_sum", "SiR2", "MuSc", "MuScA" };
00017                 for(int i=0;i<num_det_names;i++) fDetectorNames.push_back(det_names[i]);
00018         }
00019         ResetDetectors();
00020 }

00023 }

00025 void TMuonEvent::ResetDetectors(){
00026    // For now just NULL the pointers, but we need to decide an ownership scheme
00027    // in which case we may want to delete them as well
00028    for(size_t i=0;i<fDetectorNames.size();i++){
00029        SetPulse(fDetectorNames[i],NULL);
00030    }
00031 }
00032 
00033 int TMuonEvent::GetNumPulses()const{
00034         int count=0;
00035         for(size_t i=0;i<fDetectorNames.size();i++){
00036                 if(GetPulse(fDetectorNames[i])) count++;
00037         }
00038         return count;
00039 }

00041 #define GET_DET_IF(var,detector)\
00042         else if(var==#detector) return Get##detector();
00043 
00044 TDetectorPulse* TMuonEvent::GetPulse(const std::string& detector)const{
00045         if(detector=="") return NULL;
00046         GET_DET_IF(detector,Ge)
00047         GET_DET_IF(detector,LiquidSc)
00048         GET_DET_IF(detector,NDet)
00049         GET_DET_IF(detector,NDet2)
00050         GET_DET_IF(detector,ScGe)
00051         GET_DET_IF(detector,ScL)
00052         GET_DET_IF(detector,ScR)
00053         GET_DET_IF(detector,ScVe)
00054         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiL1_1)
00055         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiL1_2)
00056         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiL1_3)
00057         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiL1_4)
00058         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiL2)
00059         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiR1_1)
00060         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiR1_2)
00061         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiR1_3)
00062         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiR1_4)
00063         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiR1_sum)
00064         GET_DET_IF(detector,SiR2)
00065         GET_DET_IF(detector,MuSc)
00066         GET_DET_IF(detector,MuScA)
00067         // No detector exists with that name, complain and return NULL
00068         cout<<"No detector called '"<<detector<<"' exists."<<endl;
00069         return NULL;
00070 }
00071 #undef GET_DET_IF

00073 #define SET_DET_IF(var,detector,value)\
00074         else if(var==#detector) Set##detector(pulse);
00075 
00076 void TMuonEvent::SetPulse(const std::string& detector,TDetectorPulse* pulse){
00077         if(detector=="") return;
00078         SET_DET_IF(detector , Ge       , pulse)
00079         SET_DET_IF(detector , LiquidSc , pulse)
00080         SET_DET_IF(detector , NDet     , pulse)
00081         SET_DET_IF(detector , NDet2    , pulse)
00082         SET_DET_IF(detector , ScGe     , pulse)
00083         SET_DET_IF(detector , ScL      , pulse)
00084         SET_DET_IF(detector , ScR      , pulse)
00085         SET_DET_IF(detector , ScVe     , pulse)
00086         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiL1_1   , pulse)
00087         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiL1_2   , pulse)
00088         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiL1_3   , pulse)
00089         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiL1_4   , pulse)
00090         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiL2     , pulse)
00091         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiR1_1   , pulse)
00092         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiR1_2   , pulse)
00093         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiR1_3   , pulse)
00094         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiR1_4   , pulse)
00095         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiR1_sum , pulse)
00096         SET_DET_IF(detector , SiR2     , pulse)
00097         SET_DET_IF(detector , MuSc     , pulse)
00098         SET_DET_IF(detector , MuScA    , pulse)
00099         // No detector exists with that name, complain and return NULL
00100         cout<<"No detector called '"<<detector<<"' exists."<<endl;
